original_dialogue.patient: Hi Doctor, I am having Pharynx discomfort and Hemoptysis
original_dialogue.doctor: Is it? Then do you experience Fever?

original_dialogue.patient: No, I never had anything like that.
original_dialogue.doctor: In that case, do you have any Hard to swallow?
Is it? Then do you experience Hoarse?
Oh, do you have any Palpitations?
I believe you are having Esophagitis.

gpt3_output_with_improvement.patient: Hi Doctor, I am having Pharynx discomfort and Hemoptysis.
No, I never had anything like that
gpt3_output_with_improvement.doctor: Is it? Then do you experience Coughing up blood?
Do you have any Shortness of breath?
Ok, this means you might be having Bronchitis.

issue: GPT-3 begins by asking if patient has fever but then asks a different set of questions which finally leads the diagnosis to decide that patient has Bronchitis instead of Esophagitis
improvement: GPT-3 has asked multiple questions to understand what symptoms the patient might have instead of directly making a decision about the disease.
